text: Udhayathara (born Sijo Varghese on 16 March 1988) is an Indian film actress, who predominantly acts in Tamil and Malayalam cinema but also appears in Kannada and Telugu films."Udhayathara in Dhanush’s film", Behind Woods News Bureau, 1 April 2008.
